overview: When the demonic Seonggun steals the power of the physical realm and tries to usurp the loser's position, the heavenly emperor seals the 'power stone', the power of the physical realm, to two female babies and hides them in the human realm to prevent the plot of the demon army.  Years later, Ma-gun seduces Tang Mi-myeok, a woman from the Tang Dynasty, and informs her that there is a 'boshen  statue' in the human world, who has been searching for a thousand years, and even finds her soul. However, this is a ploy by the demon army to find the two princesses and obtain the 'Skill Stone', and the  ' Conservation Prize' is in danger... Will Sang'  be able to awaken the divine power and protect the ability stone and the two princesses?
title: Bao Zun
